fullText: With live events being all the rage on broadcast television these days, it was only a matter of time before someone attempted to top NBC’s one-stage theatrical productions (“Peter Pan,” “The Sound of Music”). And so on Sunday night, weeks after NBC finally figured out that the third time’s a charm with “The Wiz Live,” Fox took over the reins with “Grease: Live,” two sound stages and an outdoor set at the mercy of El Nino.
